document.getElementById(\'picComment\' + assignmentid);\n            if (document.getElementById(\'divComments\' + assignmentid).style.display == \'none\')\n            {\n                document.getElementById(\'divComments\' + assignmentid).style.display = \'inline\';\n            }\n            else\n                document.getElementById(\'divComments\' + assignmentid).style.display = \'none\';\n        }\n\n        function printRubric(assignmentid, courseCode, courseSection, schoolCode, courseid)\n        {\n assignmentid + \'&courseCode=\' + courseCode + \'&courseSection=\' + courseSection + \'&courseid=\' + courseid,\'\',\'location=no,status=no\');\n        }\n\n        function openDescriptionDiv(assid)\n        {\n            if (document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid).style.display == \'none\')\n            {\n                var ta = document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid);\n                document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid).style.display = \'inline-block\';\n                document.getElementById(\'EndDescription\' + assid).focus();\n            }\n            else\n                document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid).style.display = \'none\';\n        }\n\n        function changeCourse(courseSectionKey)\n        {\n            var courseCode      = courseSectionKey.substring(0,courseSectionKey.indexOf(":"));\n            var courseSection   = courseSectionKey.substring(courseSectionKey.indexOf(":") + 1);\n            location.href = \'/genesis/parents?tab1=studentdata&tab2=gradebook&tab3=coursesummary&studentid=10009778&mp=MP2&action=form&courseCode=\' + courseCode + \'&courseSection=\' + courseSection;\n        }\n\n        function displayMPs()\n        {\n            $( \'#divChangeMarkingPeriod\').dialog({\n                resizable: false,\n                height:\'auto\',\n                width:\'auto\',\n                modal: true,\n                buttons: {\n                    \'Switch Marking Period\': function() {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        var markingPeriod = document.getElementById(\'fldSwitchMP\').value;\n                        location.href = \'/genesis/parents?tab1=studentdata&tab2=gradebook&tab3=coursesummary&studentid=10009778&mp=\' + markingPeriod + \'&action=form&courseCode=H13051&courseSection=121\';\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function() {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n\n        }\n\n    </script>\n<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" charset="UTF-8" href="https://translate.googleapis.com/translate_static/css/translateelement.css"><script type="text/javascript" charset="UTF-8"       location.href = document.URL.replace(\'10009778\',newstudentid);\n        }\n\n        function header_goToTab(newTab1, appendParams)\n        {\n            if (appendParams == \'\')\n                location.href=\'/genesis/parents?tab1=\' + newTab1 + \'&action=form\';\n            else\n                location.href=\'/genesis/parents?tab1=\' + newTab1 + \'&action=form\' + \'&\' + appendParams;\n        }\n\n        function initHeader()\n        {\n            \n        }\n\n        function confirmDialog(questionToAsk, okFunction, cancelFunction)\n        {\n            $( "#_dialog-confirm_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, height:\'auto\', width:600, modal: true,\n                title: \'Confirmation\',\n                open: function()\n                {\n                    $(\'#_confirmDialogText_\').html(questionToAsk);\n                },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (okFunction!=null)\n                            okFunction();\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (cancelFunction!=null)\n                            cancelFunction();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function alertDialog(alertText, okCallback)\n        {\n            $( "#_dialog-alert_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, height:\'auto\', width:600, modal: true,\n                title: \'Information\',\n                open: function()\n                {\n                    $(\'#_confirmAlertText_\').html(alertText);\n                },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (okCallback)\n                            okCallback();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function promptDialog(questionToAsk, defaultAnswer, okFunction, cancelFunction)\n        {\n            if (defaultAnswer==null) defaultAnswer = \'\';\n            $( "#_dialog-prompt_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, height:\'auto\', width:600, modal: true,\n                title: \'Prompt\',\n                open: function()\n                {\n                    $(\'#_confirmPromptText_\').html(questionToAsk);\n                    $(\'#_prompt_dialog_value_\').val(defaultAnswer).removeClass(\'fieldValueChanged\').addClass(\'fieldValue\').focus().select();\n                },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (okFunction!=null)\n                        {\n                            var __prompt__answer = $(\'#_prompt_dialog_value_\').val();\n                            if (__prompt__answer == null) __prompt__answer = \'\';\n                            $(\'#_prompt_dialog_value_\').removeClass(\'fieldValueChanged\').addClass(\'fieldValue\');\n                            okFunction(__prompt__answer);\n                        }\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (cancelFunction!=null)\n                            cancelFunction();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function toggleDisclaimer()\n        {\n            location.href = document.URL + \'&toggleDisclaimer=true\';\n        }\n\n        var message = \'\';\n        if (message.length>0)\n        {\n            $(function () {\n                alertDialog(message);\n            });\n        }\n        \n\n    </script>\n <!-- Start of Header-->\n\n\n<div class="headerModules">\n    <div style="text-align: Schools</title>\n\n\n\n    <script type="text/javascript">\n\n        function viewDocument(courseid, assignmentid, name, type)\n        {\n            window.open(\'/genesis/parents?tab1=studentdata&tab2=gradebook&tab3=coursesummary&studentid=10009778&action=viewDocument&courseid=\' + courseid + \'&stripCode=\' + assignmentid + \'&fileName=\' + encodeURIComponent(name) + \'&fileType=\' + type,\'Document\');\n        }\n\n        function displayComments(assignmentid)\n        {\n            var objPicture = document.getElementById(\'picComment\' + assignmentid);\n            if (document.getElementById(\'divComments\' + assignmentid).style.display == \'none\')\n            {\n                document.getElementById(\'divComments\' + assignmentid).style.display = \'inline\';\n            }\n            else\n                document.getElementById(\'divComments\' + assignmentid).style.display = \'none\';\n        }\n\n        function printRubric(assignmentid, courseCode, courseSection, schoolCode, courseid)\n        {\n            window.open(\'/genesis/parents?tab1=studentdata&tab2=gradebook&studentid=10009778&type=class&grades=y&action=printRubric&schoolYear=2017-18&schoolCode=\' + schoolCode + \'&assignmentid=\' + assignmentid + \'&courseCode=\' + courseCode + \'&courseSection=\' + courseSection + \'&courseid=\' + courseid,\'\',\'location=no,status=no\');\n        }\n\n        function openDescriptionDiv(assid)\n        {\n            if (document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid).style.display == \'none\')\n            {\n                var ta = document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid);\n                document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid).style.display = \'inline-block\';\n                document.getElementById(\'EndDescription\' + assid).focus();\n            }\n            else\n                document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid).style.display = \'none\';\n        }\n\n        function changeCourse(courseSectionKey)\n        {\n            var courseCode      = courseSectionKey.substring(0,courseSectionKey.indexOf(":"));\n            var courseSection   = courseSectionKey.substring(courseSectionKey.indexOf(":") + 1);\n            location.href = \'/genesis/parents?tab1=studentdata&tab2=gradebook&tab3=coursesummary&studentid=10009778&mp=MP3&action=form&courseCode=\' + courseCode + \'&courseSection=\' + courseSection;\n        }\n\n        function displayMPs()\n        {\n            $( \'#divChangeMarkingPeriod\').dialog({\n                resizable: false,\n                height:\'auto\',\n                width:\'auto\',\n + markingPeriod + \'&action=form&courseCode=H13051&courseSection=121\';\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function() {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n\n        }\n\n    </script>\n<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" charset="UTF-8" {\n                    $(\'#_confirmDialogText_\').html(questionToAsk);\n                },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (okFunction!=null)\n                            okFunction();\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (cancelFunction!=null)\n                            cancelFunction();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function alertDialog(alertText, okCallback)\n        {\n            $( "#_dialog-alert_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, height:\'auto\', width:600, modal: true,\n                title: \'Information\',\n                open: function()\n                {\n                    $(\'#_confirmAlertText_\').html(alertText);\n                },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this promptDialog(questionToAsk, defaultAnswer, okFunction, cancelFunction)\n        {\n            if (defaultAnswer==null) defaultAnswer = \'\';\n            $( "#_dialog-prompt_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, height:\'auto\', width:600, modal: true,\n                title: \'Prompt\',\n                open: function()\n                {\n                    $(\'#_confirmPromptText_\').html(questionToAsk);\n                    $(\'#_prompt_dialog_value_\').val(defaultAnswer).removeClass(\'fieldValueChanged\').addClass(\'fieldValue\').focus().select();\n                },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (okFunction!=null)\n                        {\n                            var __prompt__answer = $(\'#_prompt_dialog_value_\').val();\n                            if (__prompt__answer == null) __prompt__answer = \'\';\n                            $(\'#_prompt_dialog_value_\').removeClass(\'fieldValueChanged\').addClass(\'fieldValue\');\n                            okFunction(__prompt__answer);\n                        }\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (cancelFunction!=null)\n                            cancelFunction();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function toggleDisclaimer()\n        {\n            location.href = document.URL + \'&toggleDisclaimer=true\';\n        }\n\n        var message = \'\';\n        if (message.length>0)\n        {\n promptDialog(questionToAsk, defaultAnswer, okFunction, cancelFunction)\n        {\n            if (defaultAnswer==null) defaultAnswer = \'\';\n            $( "#_dialog-prompt_" ).dialog({\n courseSectionKey.substring(courseSectionKey.indexOf(":") + 1);\n            location.href = + markingPeriod + \'&action=form&courseCode=H13060&courseSection=311\';\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function() {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n\n        }\n\n    </script>\n<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" charset="UTF-8"       location.href = document.URL.replace(\'10009778\',newstudentid);\n        }\n\n        function header_goToTab(newTab1, appendParams)\n        {\n            if (appendParams == \'\')\n "#_dialog-confirm_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, height:\'auto\', width:600, modal: true,\n                title: \'Confirmation\',\n                open: function()\n                {\n                    $(\'#_confirmDialogText_\').html(questionToAsk);\n                },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (okFunction!=null)\n                            okFunction();\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (cancelFunction!=null)\n                            cancelFunction();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function alertDialog(alertText, okCallback)\n        {\n            $( "#_dialog-alert_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, height:\'auto\', width:600, modal: true,\n                title: \'Information\',\n                open: function()\n                {\n                    $(\'#_confirmAlertText_\').html(alertText);\n                },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (okCallback)\n                            okCallback();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function promptDialog(questionToAsk, defaultAnswer, okFunction, cancelFunction)\n        {\n            if (defaultAnswer==null) defaultAnswer = \'\';\n            $( "#_dialog-prompt_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, height:\'auto\', width:600, modal: true,\n                title: \'Prompt\',\n                open: function()\n                {\n                    $(\'#_confirmPromptText_\').html(questionToAsk);\n                    $(\'#_prompt_dialog_value_\').val(defaultAnswer).removeClass(\'fieldValueChanged\').addClass(\'fieldValue\').focus().select();\n                },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (okFunction!=null)\n                        {\n                            var __prompt__answer = $(\'#_prompt_dialog_value_\').val();\n                            if (__prompt__answer == null) __prompt__answer = \'\';\n                            $(\'#_prompt_dialog_value_\').removeClass(\'fieldValueChanged\').addClass(\'fieldValue\');\n                            okFunction(__prompt__answer);\n                        }\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (cancelFunction!=null)\n                            cancelFunction();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function toggleDisclaimer()\n        {\n            location.href = document.URL + \'&toggleDisclaimer=true\';\n        }\n\n        var message = \'\';\n        if (message.length>0)\n        {\n            $(function () {\n                alertDialog(message);\n            });\n        }\n        \n\n    </script>\n <!-- Start of Header-->\n\n\n<div class="headerModules">\n    <div style="text-align: assignmentid).style.display = \'none\';\n        }\n\n        function printRubric(assignmentid, courseCode, courseSection, schoolCode, courseid)\n        {\n openDescriptionDiv(assid)\n        {\n            if (document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid).style.display == \'none\')\n            {\n                var ta = document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid);\n                document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid).style.display = \'inline-block\';\n }\n\n        function changeCourse(courseSectionKey)\n        {\n            var courseCode      = courseSectionKey.substring(0,courseSectionKey.indexOf(":"));\n            var courseSection   = courseSectionKey.substring(courseSectionKey.indexOf(":") + 1);\n            location.href = \'/genesis/parents?tab1=studentdata&tab2=gradebook&tab3=coursesummary&studentid=10009778&mp=MP3&action=form&courseCode=\' + courseCode + \'&courseSection=\' + courseSection;\n        }\n\n + markingPeriod + \'&action=form&courseCode=H13060&courseSection=311\';\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function() {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n\n        }\n\n    </script>\n<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" charset="UTF-8" href="https://translate.googleapis.com/translate_static/css/translateelement.css"><script type="text/javascript" charset="UTF-8"       location.href = document.URL.replace(\'10009778\',newstudentid);\n        }\n\n        function header_goToTab(newTab1, appendParams)\n        {\n            if (appendParams == \'\')\n                location.href=\'/genesis/parents?tab1=\' + newTab1 + \'&action=form\';\n            else\n                location.href=\'/genesis/parents?tab1=\' + newTab1 + \'&action=form\' + \'&\' + appendParams;\n        }\n\n        function initHeader()\n        {\n            \n        }\n\n        function confirmDialog(questionToAsk, okFunction, cancelFunction)\n        {\n            $( "#_dialog-confirm_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, height:\'auto\', width:600, modal: true,\n                title: \'Confirmation\',\n                open: function()\n                {\n                    $(\'#_confirmDialogText_\').html(questionToAsk);\n                },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (okFunction!=null)\n                            okFunction();\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (cancelFunction!=null)\n                            cancelFunction();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function alertDialog(alertText, okCallback)\n        {\n            $( "#_dialog-alert_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, height:\'auto\', width:600, modal: true,\n                title: \'Information\',\n                open: function()\n                {\n                    $(\'#_confirmAlertText_\').html(alertText);\n                },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (okCallback)\n                            okCallback();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function promptDialog(questionToAsk, defaultAnswer, okFunction, cancelFunction)\n        {\n            if (defaultAnswer==null) defaultAnswer = \'\';\n            $( "#_dialog-prompt_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, height:\'auto\', width:600, modal: true,\n                title: \'Prompt\',\n                open: function()\n                {\n                    $(\'#_confirmPromptText_\').html(questionToAsk);\n                    $(\'#_prompt_dialog_value_\').val(defaultAnswer).removeClass(\'fieldValueChanged\').addClass(\'fieldValue\').focus().select();\n                },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (okFunction!=null)\n                        {\n                            var __prompt__answer = $(\'#_prompt_dialog_value_\').val();\n                            if (__prompt__answer == null) __prompt__answer = \'\';\n                            $(\'#_prompt_dialog_value_\').removeClass(\'fieldValueChanged\').addClass(\'fieldValue\');\n                            okFunction(__prompt__answer);\n                        }\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (cancelFunction!=null)\n                            cancelFunction();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function toggleDisclaimer()\n        {\n            location.href = document.URL + \'&toggleDisclaimer=true\';\n        }\n\n        var message = \'\';\n        if (message.length>0)\n        {\n            $(function () {\n                alertDialog(message);\n            });\n        }\n        \n\n    </script>\n <!-- Start of Header-->\n\n\n<div class="headerModules">\n    <div style="text-align: document.getElementById(\'picComment\' + assignmentid);\n            if (document.getElementById(\'divComments\' + assignmentid).style.display == \'none\')\n            {\n                document.getElementById(\'divComments\' + assignmentid).style.display = \'inline\';\n            }\n            else\n                document.getElementById(\'divComments\' + assignmentid).style.display = \'none\';\n        }\n\n        function printRubric(assignmentid, courseCode, courseSection, schoolCode, courseid)\n        {\n assignmentid + \'&courseCode=\' + courseCode + \'&courseSection=\' + courseSection + \'&courseid=\' + courseid,\'\',\'location=no,status=no\');\n        }\n\n        function openDescriptionDiv(assid)\n        {\n            if (document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid).style.display == \'none\')\n            {\n                var ta = document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid);\n                document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid).style.display = \'inline-block\';\n                document.getElementById(\'EndDescription\' + assid).focus();\n            }\n            else\n                document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid).style.display = \'none\';\n        }\n\n        function changeCourse(courseSectionKey)\n        {\n            var courseCode      = courseSectionKey.substring(0,courseSectionKey.indexOf(":"));\n            var courseSection   = courseSectionKey.substring(courseSectionKey.indexOf(":") + 1);\n            location.href = \'/genesis/parents?tab1=studentdata&tab2=gradebook&tab3=coursesummary&studentid=10009778&mp=MP4&action=form&courseCode=\' + courseCode + \'&courseSection=\' + courseSection;\n        }\n\n        function displayMPs()\n        {\n            $( \'#divChangeMarkingPeriod\').dialog({\n                resizable: false,\n                height:\'auto\',\n                width:\'auto\',\n markingPeriod = document.getElementById(\'fldSwitchMP\').value;\n                        location.href = \'/genesis/parents?tab1=studentdata&tab2=gradebook&tab3=coursesummary&studentid=10009778&mp=\' + markingPeriod + \'&action=form&courseCode=H13060&courseSection=311\';\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function() {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n\n        }\n\n    </script>\n<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" charset="UTF-8" {\n                    $(\'#_confirmDialogText_\').html(questionToAsk);\n                },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (okFunction!=null)\n                            okFunction();\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (cancelFunction!=null)\n                            cancelFunction();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function alertDialog(alertText, okCallback)\n        {\n            $( "#_dialog-alert_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, height:\'auto\', width:600, modal: true,\n                title: \'Information\',\n                open: function()\n                {\n promptDialog(questionToAsk, defaultAnswer, okFunction, cancelFunction)\n        {\n            if (defaultAnswer==null) defaultAnswer = \'\';\n            $( "#_dialog-prompt_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, height:\'auto\', width:600, modal: true,\n                title: \'Prompt\',\n                open: function()\n                {\n okFunction(__prompt__answer);\n                        }\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (cancelFunction!=null)\n                            cancelFunction();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function toggleDisclaimer()\n        {\n            location.href = document.URL + \'&toggleDisclaimer=true\';\n        }\n\n        var message = \'\';\n        if (message.length>0)\n        {\n encodeURIComponent(name) + \'&fileType=\' + type,\'Document\');\n        }\n\n        function displayComments(assignmentid)\n        {\n            var objPicture = document.getElementById(\'picComment\' + assignmentid);\n            if (document.getElementById(\'divComments\' + assignmentid).style.display == \'none\')\n            {\n                document.getElementById(\'divComments\' + assignmentid).style.display = \'inline\';\n            }\n            else\n                document.getElementById(\'divComments\' + assignmentid).style.display = \'none\';\n        }\n\n        function printRubric(assignmentid, courseCode, courseSection, schoolCode, courseid)\n        {\n            window.open(\'/genesis/parents?tab1=studentdata&tab2=gradebook&studentid=10009778&type=class&grades=y&action=printRubric&schoolYear=2017-18&schoolCode=\' + schoolCode + \'&assignmentid=\' + assignmentid + \'&courseCode=\' + courseCode + \'&courseSection=\' + courseSection + \'&courseid=\' + courseid,\'\',\'location=no,status=no\');\n        }\n\n        function openDescriptionDiv(assid)\n        {\n            if (document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid).style.display == \'none\')\n            {\n                var ta = document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid);\n                document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid).style.display = \'inline-block\';\n                document.getElementById(\'EndDescription\' + assid).focus();\n            }\n            else\n                document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid).style.display = \'none\';\n        }\n\n        function changeCourse(courseSectionKey)\n        {\n            var courseCode      = courseSectionKey.substring(0,courseSectionKey.indexOf(":"));\n            var courseSection   = courseSectionKey.substring(courseSectionKey.indexOf(":") + 1);\n            location.href = \'/genesis/parents?tab1=studentdata&tab2=gradebook&tab3=coursesummary&studentid=10009778&mp=MP1&action=form&courseCode=\' + courseCode + \'&courseSection=\' + courseSection;\n        }\n\n        function displayMPs()\n        {\n            $( \'#divChangeMarkingPeriod\').dialog({\n                resizable: false,\n                height:\'auto\',\n                width:\'auto\',\n                modal: true,\n                buttons: {\n                    \'Switch Marking Period\': function() {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        var markingPeriod = document.getElementById(\'fldSwitchMP\').value;\n                        location.href = \'/genesis/parents?tab1=studentdata&tab2=gradebook&tab3=coursesummary&studentid=10009778&mp=\' + markingPeriod + \'&action=form&courseCode=H13310&courseSection=321\';\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function() {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n\n        }\n\n    </script>\n<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" charset="UTF-8" href="https://translate.googleapis.com/translate_static/css/translateelement.css"><script type="text/javascript" charset="UTF-8" src="https://translate.googleapis.com/translate_static/js/element/main.js"></script><script type="text/javascript" charset="UTF-8"       location.href = document.URL.replace(\'10009778\',newstudentid);\n        }\n\n        function header_goToTab(newTab1, appendParams)\n        {\n            if (appendParams == \'\')\n                location.href=\'/genesis/parents?tab1=\' + newTab1 + \'&action=form\';\n            else\n                location.href=\'/genesis/parents?tab1=\' + newTab1 + \'&action=form\' + \'&\' + "#_dialog-confirm_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, height:\'auto\', width:600, modal: true,\n                title: \'Confirmation\',\n                open: function()\n                {\n                    $(\'#_confirmDialogText_\').html(questionToAsk);\n                },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (okFunction!=null)\n                            okFunction();\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (cancelFunction!=null)\n                            cancelFunction();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function alertDialog(alertText, okCallback)\n        {\n            $( "#_dialog-alert_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, height:\'auto\', width:600, modal: true,\n                title: \'Information\',\n                open: function()\n                {\n                    $(\'#_confirmAlertText_\').html(alertText);\n                },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (okCallback)\n                            okCallback();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function promptDialog(questionToAsk, defaultAnswer, okFunction, cancelFunction)\n        {\n            if (defaultAnswer==null) defaultAnswer = \'\';\n            $( "#_dialog-prompt_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, height:\'auto\', width:600, modal: true,\n                title: \'Prompt\',\n                open: function()\n                {\n                    $(\'#_confirmPromptText_\').html(questionToAsk);\n                    $(\'#_prompt_dialog_value_\').val(defaultAnswer).removeClass(\'fieldValueChanged\').addClass(\'fieldValue\').focus().select();\n                },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (okFunction!=null)\n                        {\n                            var __prompt__answer = $(\'#_prompt_dialog_value_\').val();\n                            if (__prompt__answer == null) __prompt__answer = \'\';\n                            $(\'#_prompt_dialog_value_\').removeClass(\'fieldValueChanged\').addClass(\'fieldValue\');\n                            okFunction(__prompt__answer);\n                        }\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (cancelFunction!=null)\n                            cancelFunction();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function toggleDisclaimer()\n        {\n            location.href = document.URL + \'&toggleDisclaimer=true\';\n        }\n\n        var message = \'\';\n        if (message.length>0)\n        {\n Schools</title>\n\n\n\n    <script type="text/javascript">\n\n        function viewDocument(courseid, assignmentid, name, type)\n        {\n            window.open(\'/genesis/parents?tab1=studentdata&tab2=gradebook&tab3=coursesummary&studentid=10009778&action=viewDocument&courseid=\' + courseid + \'&stripCode=\' + assignmentid + \'&fileName=\' + encodeURIComponent(name) + \'&fileType=\' + type,\'Document\');\n        }\n\n        function displayComments(assignmentid)\n        {\n            var objPicture = document.getElementById(\'picComment\' + assignmentid);\n            if (document.getElementById(\'divComments\' + assignmentid).style.display == \'none\')\n            {\n                document.getElementById(\'divComments\' + assignmentid).style.display = \'inline\';\n            }\n            else\n                document.getElementById(\'divComments\' + assignmentid).style.display = \'none\';\n        }\n\n        function printRubric(assignmentid, courseCode, courseSection, schoolCode, courseid)\n        {\n            window.open(\'/genesis/parents?tab1=studentdata&tab2=gradebook&studentid=10009778&type=class&grades=y&action=printRubric&schoolYear=2017-18&schoolCode=\' + schoolCode + \'&assignmentid=\' + assignmentid + \'&courseCode=\' + courseCode + \'&courseSection=\' + courseSection + \'&courseid=\' + courseid,\'\',\'location=no,status=no\');\n        }\n\n        function openDescriptionDiv(assid)\n        {\n            if (document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid).style.display == \'none\')\n            {\n                var ta = document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid);\n                document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid).style.display = \'inline-block\';\n                document.getElementById(\'EndDescription\' + assid).focus();\n            }\n            else\n                document.getElementById(\'divDescription\' + assid).style.display = \'none\';\n        }\n\n        function changeCourse(courseSectionKey)\n        {\n            var courseCode      = courseSectionKey.substring(0,courseSectionKey.indexOf(":"));\n            var courseSection   = courseSectionKey.substring(courseSectionKey.indexOf(":") + 1);\n            location.href = \'/genesis/parents?tab1=studentdata&tab2=gradebook&tab3=coursesummary&studentid=10009778&mp=MP2&action=form&courseCode=\' + courseCode + \'&courseSection=\' + courseSection;\n        }\n\n        function displayMPs()\n        {\n            $( \'#divChangeMarkingPeriod\').dialog({\n                resizable: false,\n                height:\'auto\',\n                width:\'auto\',\n                modal: true,\n                buttons: {\n                    \'Switch Marking Period\': function() {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        var markingPeriod = document.getElementById(\'fldSwitchMP\').value;\n                        location.href = \'/genesis/parents?tab1=studentdata&tab2=gradebook&tab3=coursesummary&studentid=10009778&mp=\' + markingPeriod + \'&action=form&courseCode=H13310&courseSection=321\';\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function() {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n\n        }\n\n    </script>\n<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" charset="UTF-8"       location.href = document.URL.replace(\'10009778\',newstudentid);\n        }\n\n        function header_goToTab(newTab1, appendParams)\n        {\n            if (appendParams == \'\')\n "#_dialog-confirm_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, height:\'auto\', width:600, modal: true,\n                title: \'Confirmation\',\n                open: function()\n                {\n                    $(\'#_confirmDialogText_\').html(questionToAsk);\n                },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (okFunction!=null)\n                            okFunction();\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (cancelFunction!=null)\n                            cancelFunction();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function alertDialog(alertText, okCallback)\n        {\n            $( "#_dialog-alert_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, height:\'auto\', width:600, modal: true,\n                title: \'Information\',\n                open: function()\n                {\n                    $(\'#_confirmAlertText_\').html(alertText);\n                },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (okCallback)\n                            okCallback();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function promptDialog(questionToAsk, defaultAnswer, okFunction, cancelFunction)\n        {\n            if (defaultAnswer==null) defaultAnswer = \'\';\n            $( "#_dialog-prompt_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, height:\'auto\', width:600, modal: true,\n                title: \'Prompt\',\n                open: function()\n                {\n                    $(\'#_confirmPromptText_\').html(questionToAsk);\n                    $(\'#_prompt_dialog_value_\').val(defaultAnswer).removeClass(\'fieldValueChanged\').addClass(\'fieldValue\').focus().select();\n                },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (okFunction!=null)\n                        {\n                            var __prompt__answer = $(\'#_prompt_dialog_value_\').val();\n                            if (__prompt__answer == null) __prompt__answer = \'\';\n                            $(\'#_prompt_dialog_value_\').removeClass(\'fieldValueChanged\').addClass(\'fieldValue\');\n                            okFunction(__prompt__answer);\n                        }\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (cancelFunction!=null)\n                            cancelFunction();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function toggleDisclaimer()\n        {\n            location.href = document.URL + \'&toggleDisclaimer=true\';\n        }\n\n        var message = \'\';\n        if (message.length>0)\n        {\n promptDialog(questionToAsk, defaultAnswer, okFunction, cancelFunction)\n        {\n            if (defaultAnswer==null) defaultAnswer = \'\';\n            $( "#_dialog-prompt_" ).dialog({\n  \n                <tr class="listroweven"><td colspan="15" class="cellCenter" height="50px">No assignments were found using the criteria above.</td></tr>\n            \n\n            \n            \n            <tr><td colspan="15">\n                <div style="font-size: 10pt;padding-top:5px;padding-left: 10px;">* Assignments graded as <b>EX (Exempt)</b> or <b>A (Absent)</b> do not impact a student\'s grade.</div>\n                <div style="font-size: 10pt;padding-bottom:5px;padding-left: 10px;">* Assignments graded as <b>M (Missing)</b> counts as <b>0.0%</b> and <b>I (Incomplete)</b> counts as <b>0.0%</b>.</div>\n            </td></tr>\n\n            <tr>\n                <td colspan="15">\n                    <div style="padding-top: 22px;">\n                        <div style="text-align: left;font-size: 14pt;padding-bottom:3px;"><b>Grading Information</b> <span style="font-size: 11pt;">Marking Period 3</span></div>\n                        \n                            Students are graded by <b>Total Points</b> in this course.  The final average for the marking period is determined by dividing the Earned Points by the Attempted Points.\n                            \n                        \n                        \n                    </div>\n\n                        \n                            \n                        \n\n                </td>\n            </tr>\n\n            \n                <tr>\n promptDialog(questionToAsk, defaultAnswer, okFunction, cancelFunction)\n        {\n            if (defaultAnswer==null) defaultAnswer = \'\';\n            $( "#_dialog-prompt_" ).dialog({\n promptDialog(questionToAsk, defaultAnswer, okFunction, cancelFunction)\n        {\n            if (defaultAnswer==null) defaultAnswer = \'\';\n            $( "#_dialog-prompt_" ).dialog({\n promptDialog(questionToAsk, defaultAnswer, okFunction, cancelFunction)\n        {\n            if (defaultAnswer==null) defaultAnswer = \'\';\n            $( "#_dialog-prompt_" ).dialog({\n            <tr><td colspan="15">\n                <div style="font-size: 10pt;padding-top:5px;padding-left: 10px;">* Assignments graded as <b>EX (Exempt)</b> or <b>A (Absent)</b> do not impact a style="text-align: left;font-size: 14pt;padding-bottom:3px;"><b>Grading Information</b> <span style="font-size: 11pt;">Marking Period 4</span></div>\n                        \n                        \n                            <div style="padding-bottom: 8px;">Students are graded by <b>Category Weighting</b> in this course.  A grade is calculated by taking the average of each category and getting a value for the category based on the weight.  Each category score is then added and a total average is formulated.</div>\n                            <table class="list" style="margin:auto;">\n                                <tbody><tr {\n                    $(\'#_confirmDialogText_\').html(questionToAsk);\n                },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (okFunction!=null)\n                            okFunction();\n                    },\n                    Cancel: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (cancelFunction!=null)\n                            cancelFunction();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function alertDialog(alertText, okCallback)\n        {\n            $( "#_dialog-alert_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, height:\'auto\', width:600, modal: true,\n                title: \'Information\',\n                open: function()\n                {\n promptDialog(questionToAsk, defaultAnswer, okFunction, cancelFunction)\n        {\n            if (defaultAnswer==null) defaultAnswer = \'\';\n            $( "#_dialog-prompt_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, height:\'auto\', width:600, modal: true,\n                title: \'Prompt\',\n                open: function()\n                {\n              },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                       if (cancelFunction!=null)\n                            cancelFunction();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function promptDialog(questionToAsk, defaultAnswer, okFunction, cancelFunction)\n        {\n            if (defaultAnswer==null) defaultAnswer = \'\';\n            $( "#_dialog-prompt_" ).dialog({\n       }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function alertDialog(alertText, okCallback)\n        {\n            $( "#_dialog-alert_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, promptDialog(questionToAsk, defaultAnswer, okFunction, cancelFunction)\n        {\n            if (defaultAnswer==null) defaultAnswer = \'\';\n            $( "#_dialog-prompt_" ).dialog({\n promptDialog(questionToAsk, defaultAnswer, okFunction, cancelFunction)\n        {\n            if (defaultAnswer==null) defaultAnswer = \'\';\n            $( "#_dialog-prompt_" ).dialog({\n       }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function alertDialog(alertText, okCallback)\n        {\n            $( "#_dialog-alert_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, promptDialog(questionToAsk, defaultAnswer, okFunction, cancelFunction)\n        {\n            if (defaultAnswer==null) defaultAnswer = \'\';\n            $( "#_dialog-prompt_" ).dialog({\n {\n                    $(\'#_confirmDialogText_\').html(questionToAsk);\n                },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                        if (cancelFunction!=null)\n                            cancelFunction();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function alertDialog(alertText, okCallback)\n        {\n            $( "#_dialog-alert_" ).dialog({\n                resizable: false, promptDialog(questionToAsk, defaultAnswer, okFunction, cancelFunction)\n        {\n            if (defaultAnswer==null) defaultAnswer = \'\';\n            $( "#_dialog-prompt_" ).dialog({\n              },\n                buttons:\n                {\n                    Ok: function()\n                    {\n                        $( this ).dialog( "close" );\n                       if (cancelFunction!=null)\n                            cancelFunction();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function
